education.institution: National Taiwan University of Science and Technology
education.degree: B.B.A in Industrial Management & Finance, Minor in Computer Science

achievements: Engineered a production-grade ETL pipeline using FastAPI and Kafka to normalize financial data from Stripe and Quickbook, enabling real-time cashflow analysis for AI-driven insights.
Improved LLM intent routing accuracy by ~20%, reducing fallback responses and increasing successful query resolution in a customer-facing financial assistant.
Orchestrated containerized backend services using Docker and GitHub Actions on AWS EC2, ensuring deployment consistency across environments.
Architected a context-aware memory system using LangGraph that combines short-term conversational history with vector-based retrieval to prevent context drift in long-running AI sessions.
Developed an agentic query routing framework to classify user intent and orchestrate specialized prompt chains, integrating external tool-calling for real-time data grounding.
Designed a high-granularity MongoDB logging schema to track latency, token usage, and interaction signals, facilitating systematic LLM evaluation and performance tuning.
Developed and launched core social features including real-time messaging and event-based maps using Next.js and Supabase, supporting successful beta testing with local businesses.
Optimized PostgreSQL database performance through normalized schema design and strict indexing, ensuring data integrity for scalable user interactions.

technical_projects.title: Hierarchical Multi-Agent Novel Generator
highlights: Designed a 3-tier agent hierarchy (Director, Planner, Writer) to generate coherent 10,000+ word narratives.
Solved context window limitations by implementing recursive self-correction loops and persistent state management via Supabase.
Deployed as a serverless application on Cloudflare Workers, maintaining narrative consistency across 15+ chapters.

technical_projects.title: C++20 Relational Database Kernel
highlights: Developed a high-performance storage engine featuring an LRU buffer pool manager with O(1) eviction logic.
Implemented a B+ Tree index from scratch supporting concurrent splits and O(log n) search complexity.
Engineered a bitmap-based Heap File system achieving 96% space utilization for fixed-width records.

technical_projects.title: Distributed Real-time Game Infrastructure
highlights: Orchestrated an event-driven backend using Kafka for state transition logging and Redis for low-latency session management.
Implemented Nginx reverse proxy to load balance WebSocket traffic across distributed Node.js instances.

technical_projects.title: NVIDIA Stock PriceSentiment Data Pipeline
highlights: Built an automated Medallion architecture pipeline to ingest and process 500+ daily tweets and stock data for sentiment analysis.
Automated daily ETL tasks using Azure Function Apps, transforming raw social discourse into structured financial datasets for Power BI.

technical_projects.title: Hybrid Demand Forecasting Pipeline (Research)
highlights: Achieved a 65.1% improvement in RÂ² accuracy (8.3% to 73.4%) for GPU component demand forecasting at NTUST AI Lab.
Engineered a rolling-window adaptive model combining time-series analysis with machine learning.

honors_and_awards.description: Gamified academic research engine using semantic search and AI-generated paper summaries.
Visualized U.S. Herbaria data using Groq API for dynamic botanical descriptions and Looker Studio.
